headline: Insulet Expands Omnipod 5 To Middle East As Valuation Gap Persists
summary: Insulet (NasdaqGS:PODD) has launched its Omnipod 5 Automated Insulin Delivery System in key Middle Eastern markets. The company also introduced Omnipod Discover, a new data and analytics platform tailored for these regions. These launches mark the first availability of Omnipod 5 in several Middle Eastern countries. For investors watching Insulet, this move extends the company’s core wearable insulin delivery franchise into a new geography while pairing hardware with a proprietary data...
